## PointerEvent type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PointerEvent = {
    origin: ReadOnlyVector3;
    direction: ReadOnlyVector3;
    pointerId: number;
    hit?: {
        length: number;
        hitPoint: ReadOnlyVector3;
        meshName: string;
        normal: ReadOnlyVector3;
        worldNormal: ReadOnlyVector3;
        entityId: string;
    };
};
```
